document.heading: District of Columbia Housing Finance Agency Act

history.narrative: Law 2-135, the “District of Columbia Housing Finance Agency Act,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-161, which was referred to the committee on Housing and Urban Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 25, 1978, and September 19, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 1, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-291 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
